name: The 'Sweet' Box Irish Cream Coffee
description:
This is our taster Box

Do you want to be the envy of all of your friends, family, workmates??!

Then this box will set you apart for that mid-morning Coffee break.

Forget plain old 'Instant Coffee', enjoy our quintessential medium ground 'Proper Coffee' at home or at your desk.

In this box you get - 

A premium Belgian Chocolate Zaabar accompanied by an Amazing 'Beanies' Irish Cream Flavoured Coffee.

Plus, 

A few bits 'n' bobs that you will need to enjoy it!

This 'Box' includes - 

1 x 35g Zaabar (incredible Belgian chocolate infused with tantalizing flavours)
1 x serving of amazing 'Beanies' Irish Cream flavoured medium ground coffee
1 x Kalita Kantan coffee dripper filter

and...

1 x Wooden stirrer
Milk
Sugar
Napkin

'Dare to be different!'

options.name: & 35g Zaabar MONO - Chilli Pepper from Texas
& 35g Zaabar MONO - White with Roasted Pistachios

name: The 'Standard' Box Red Berry & Rose Petal
description:
This is our Signature Box - 

2 x Delicious Crumpets accompanied by Stunning 'Storm' Red Berry & Rose Flavoured Tea.

Plus - Everything you need to enjoy it at home or work! (Well except for the Kettle, Toaster, & Cup!! Sorry!!)

This 'Box' includes - 

2 x Delicious C&C Crumpets
2 x Silk Pyramids of Stunning 'Storm' Red Berry & Rose Petal Flavoured Tea

Also,

Wooden Knife 
Wooden Spoon
Sugar
Butter
Napkin



Why not treat yourself to a stunning Zaabar and add it to your 'Standard' Box for only £2.00

options.name: 35g Zaabar Mono Chili Pepper from Texas

name: The 'Deluxe' Box 'Beanies' Coffee
description:
This is our Coffee Lovers Box - 

2 x Delicious Crumpets accompanied by all of our amazing 'Beanies' Flavoured Medium Ground Coffee.

Plus - Everything you need to enjoy it at home or work! (Well except for the Kettle, Toaster, & Cup!! Sorry!!)

This 'Box' includes - 

2 x Delicious C&C Crumpets

1 x Serving of amazing 'Beanies' Amaretto Almond Flavoured Coffee

1 x Serving of amazing 'Beanies' Rich Hazelnut Flavoured Coffee

1 x Serving of amazing 'Beanies' Irish Cream Flavoured Coffee

1 x Serving of amazing 'Beanies' Double Chocolate Flavoured Coffee

1 x Serving of amazing 'Beanies' Cinnamon & Hazelnut Flavoured Coffee

1 x Serving of amazing 'Beanies' French Vanilla Flavoured Coffee

6 x Kalita Kantan Coffee Dripper Filters

Also,

Wooden Knife 
Wooden Spoon
Wooden Stirrer
6 x Milk
6 x Sugar
Butter
Napkin

name: Beanies Rich Hazelnut Flavoured Coffee
description:
A smooth and sophisticated coffee for discerning customer.

125g of Medium ground Flavour coffee packed in a resealable pouch and presented in an eyecatching presentation box. Our Super Six range includes 6 of our most popular flavours and this high quality boxed coffee makes an the ideal gift for someone special or  buy it for yourself for pure indulgence.

If you do not have a cafetière or coffee perculator to enjoy this coffee (or work hasn't got one!), you may also like to purchase 10x 'mug mountable' Kalita coffee filters that will cover the entire medium ground contents of this delicious flavoured coffee.

name: Zaabar Mono Chili Pepper from Texas
description:
Premium Zaabar Milk Chocoloate with a 'Spicy' infusion of Chili Pepper from Texas. 

Tantalise your taste buds with this deliciously different chocolate experience. 

"Chili & chocolate??" 

'Dare to be different!'

1 x 35g Zaabar Mono Chili Pepper from Texas

name: Storm Camomile Loose Leaf Tea
description:
Organic Camomile Loose Leaf Tea

Simply pure whole camomile flowers in this tea, but with an unusually rich flavour. Just lovely - calming and soothing. Naturally caffeine free.

Ingredients: Pure camomile blossoms*. *Certified organic.

Price per 35 grams.

Why not also purchase a Tea Strainer to enjoy this loose leaf tea for just £2 extra? Fill it up with tea, sling the hook over the side of the mug and fill the mug/cup up with water!

name: Beanies French Vanilla Flavoured Coffee
description:
For the chicest of palates, a great all rounder.

125g of Medium ground Flavour coffee packed in a resealable pouch and presented in an eyecatching presentation box. Our Super Six range includes 6 of our most popular flavours and this high quality boxed coffee makes an the ideal gift for someone special or  buy it for yourself for pure indulgence.

If you do not have a cafetière or coffee perculator to enjoy this coffee (or work hasn't got one!), you may also like to purchase 10x 'mug mountable' Kalita coffee filters that will cover the entire medium ground contents of this delicious flavoured coffee.

name: Zaabar Mono Ginger from Goa
description:
Premium Zaabar Dark chocolate with a 'Warming' hint of Ginger from Goa. 

This delectable blend of the luxurious rich Dark chocolate, and delicate heat from the Ginger brings the taste of Indo-China to your taste buds.

"Enter the Dragon??!"

'Dare to be different!'

1 x 35g Zaabar Mono Ginger from Goa

name: Storm English Breakfast Loose Leaf Tea
description:
Organic English Breakfast Loose Leaf Tea

Refreshing, authentic organic English Breakfast loose leaf tea blended from our Ceylon highland and Assam tea leaves. A delicately balanced blend that allows you to distinguish the flavour of our fine tea leaves fully. Invigorating at any time of day.

Ingredients: Our special blend of Ceylon highland tea* with strong Assam tea*. *Certified organic. 

Price per 95 grams

Why not also purchase a Tea Strainer to enjoy this loose leaf tea for just £2 extra? Fill it up with tea, sling the hook over the side of the mug and fill the mug/cup up with water!

name: Storm Red Berry & Rose Petal Loose Leaf Tea
description:
Organic Red Berry & Rose Petal Loose Leaf Tea

Our super fresh and fruity tea with chunks of strawberry and apple. Squeezed full of vitamins to help keep colds and flush toxins away and rounded off with the delicate edge of rose petals. Naturally caffeine free.

Ingredients: Hibiscus*, apple bits*, rosehips*, strawberry bits* rose petals* natural flavour. *Certified organic by the Soil Association.

Price per 80g

Why not also purchase a Tea Strainer to enjoy this loose leaf tea for just £2 extra? Fill it up with tea, sling the hook over the side of the mug and fill the mug/cup up with water!

name: Beanies Amaretto Almond Flavoured Coffee
description:
A creamy smooth almond sensation, reflective of the world famous italian almond liqueur.

125g of Medium ground Flavour coffee packed in a resealable pouch and presented in an eyecatching presentation box. Our Super Six range includes 6 of our most popular flavours and this high quality boxed coffee makes an the ideal gift for someone special or  buy it for yourself for pure indulgence.

If you do not have a cafetière or coffee perculator to enjoy this coffee (or work hasn't got one!), you may also like to purchase 10x 'mug mountable' Kalita coffee filters that will cover the entire medium ground contents of this delicious flavoured coffee.

name: Zaabar Mono White Pistachios
description:
Premium Zaabar White chocolate with a 'Nutty' nibble of Roasted Pistachios. 

Enjoy this astonishing marriage between the white chocolate and the roasted pistachios.

"A unique blend??!

'Dare to be different!'

1 x 35g Zaabar Mono White Pistachios

name: Beanies Irish Cream Flavoured Coffee
description:
The very distinctive taste of Irish Cream Liqueur.

125g of Medium ground Flavour coffee packed in a resealable pouch and presented in an eyecatching presentation box. Our Super Six range includes 6 of our most popular flavours and this high quality boxed coffee makes an the ideal gift for someone special or  buy it for yourself for pure indulgence.

If you do not have a cafetière or coffee perculator to enjoy this coffee (or work hasn't got one!), you may also like to purchase 10x 'mug mountable' Kalita coffee filters that will cover the entire medium ground contents of this delicious flavoured coffee.

name: Storm Chinese Chun Mee Green Loose Leaf Tea
description:
Organic Chinese Chun Mee Green Loose Leaf Tea

An ‘eyebrow’ green tea for those times when you need a refreshing moment during your day. Clean the palate and refresh your tastebuds.

Ingredients: Chinese chun mee green tea*. *Certified organic.

price per 95g

Why not also purchase a Tea Strainer to enjoy this loose leaf tea for just £2 extra? Fill it up with tea, sling the hook over the side of the mug and fill the mug/cup up with water!

name: Zaabar Mono Guérande Salt
description:
Premium Zaabar Milk Chocolate with a 'Curious' bite of Guerande Salt. 

Seriously surprise your taste buds with this 'unusual' combination of Milk chocolate & Salt???... 

"Surely not??!"

'Dare to be different!'

1 x 35g Zaabar Mono Guérande Salt

name: Storm Rooibos Loose Leaf Tea
description:
Organic Rooibos Loose Leaf Tea

Rooibos is a red bush tea from the South African highlands. A delicious sweet and slightly nutty flavour. Naturally caffeine free. 

Ingredients: Pure 100% rooibos*. *Certified organic by the Soil Association.

Why not also purchase a Tea Strainer to enjoy this loose leaf tea for just £2 extra? Fill it up with tea, sling the hook over the side of the mug and fill the mug/cup up with water!

name: Storm Lemongrass & Vanilla Loose Leaf Tea
description:
Organic Lemongrass & Vanilla Loose Leaf Tea

Pure lemongrass mixed with delicate vanilla pods - zesty and yet beautifully smooth and balanced. A totally refreshing infusion.Naturally caffeine free.

Ingredients: lemongrass*, vanilla bits*, apple bits*, hibiscus blossoms*, orange peels*, vervain*, natural flavour, *certified organic.

Price per 65 grams

Why not also purchase a Tea Strainer to enjoy this loose leaf tea for just £2 extra? Fill it up with tea, sling the hook over the side of the mug and fill the mug/cup up with water!

name: Zaabar Mono Milk Speculoos
description:
Premium Zaabar Milk chocolate with 'Crunchy' Speculoos cookies. 

Fall in love with this delicious Milk chocolate hiding delicate pieces of Belgian biscuit. The spiced combination is that of gorgeous Gingerbread.

"Biscuit or Chocolate??!"

'Dare to be different!'

1 x 35g Zaabar Mono Milk Speculoos

name: Beanies Cinnamon & Hazelnut Flavoured Coffee
description:
Cinnamon & Hazelnut Flavour coffee, an eccentric concoction for all cinnamon lovers.

125g of Medium ground Flavour coffee packed in a resealable pouch and presented in an eyecatching presentation box. Our Super Six range includes 6 of our most popular flavours and this high quality boxed coffee makes an the ideal gift for someone special or  buy it for yourself for pure indulgence.

If you do not have a cafetière or coffee perculator to enjoy this coffee (or work hasn't got one!), you may also like to purchase 10x 'mug mountable' Kalita coffee filters that will cover the entire medium ground contents of this delicious flavoured coffee.

name: Beanies Double Chocolate Flavoured Coffee
description:
So smooth, so chocolatey, so very naughty. Coffee with the flavour of a milk chocolate.

125g of Medium ground Flavour coffee packed in a resealable pouch and presented in an eyecatching presentation box. Our Super Six range includes 6 of our most popular flavours and this high quality boxed coffee makes an the ideal gift for someone special or  buy it for yourself for pure indulgence.

If you do not have a cafetière or coffee perculator to enjoy this coffee (or work hasn't got one!), you may also like to purchase 10x 'mug mountable' Kalita coffee filters that will cover the entire medium ground contents of this delicious flavoured coffee.

name: Zaabar Mono Dark Meringue
description:
Premium Zaabar Dark chocolate with a 'Crispy' mix of  Meringue. 

What a delightful combination of dark chocolate perfection, with light, delicate meringue pieces to set your taste buds spiralling.

"No lemons??!

'Dare to be different!'

1 x 35g Zaabar Mono Dark Meringue

This is our Coffee & Tea Enthusiasts Box - 

Perhaps you are a lover of Tea '&' Coffee. This box will allow you to taste our entire range of amazing Teas & Coffees. 

Either spoil yourself, or share them with a significant other!!

We supply everything you need to enjoy it at home or work! (Well except for the Kettle & Cup!! Sorry!!)

TEA -
